title: Holiday Flagship Early-Access & Pop-up Tests
highlights: Target pack: **10–15%** footfall lift (stretch **≥25%**), **20–30%** early-window share, CPA **≤0.80×**, QR redemption **≥5%**.
A/B framing: Arm A legacy markdown vs Arm B bundle+GWP+loyalty run in the same two-week early-access window to isolate effects.
Next 30 days: finalize A/B design, instrument footfall/QR attribution, and confirm operational staffing and POS promo flags.
executive_summary: This unified holiday target pack aims for detectable foot-traffic uplift **10–15%** (stretch goal **≥25%** in top markets), early-window transaction share **20–30%** (vs ~12–15% baseline), event CPA **≤0.80×** baseline, and QR/scan redemption **≥5%** of footfall. We will test an early-access A/B inside the same two-week window: Arm A legacy markdown vs Arm B bundle+GWP+loyalty to see which preserves margin while driving early-window share. Operators and brand partners must, within **30 days**, stand up A/B holdouts, instrument door counts and QR→POS attribution, lock two-week launch windows, and align staffing, fulfillment and loyalty incentives for rapid measurement and optimization [^3][^1].
top_operator_moves: Lock the two-week early-access windows and deploy A/B holdouts (Arm A vs Arm B) with coordinated launch dates.
Instrument door counts, QR→POS linkage and POS promo flags to capture footfall, scans and event CPA attribution.
Align store staffing, fulfillment, and loyalty incentives to convert visits into enrollments and measurable early-window transactions.
